comments.body:
since the module is using `text` format, can you please remove `check_rc=retry_json` https://github.com/ansible/ansible/blob/devel/lib/ansible/modules/network/nxos/nxos_banner.py#L101?

Also does the module need this anymore https://github.com/ansible/ansible/blob/devel/lib/ansible/modules/network/nxos/nxos_banner.py#L128-L139? I think output is only `dict` type when format is `json`.

@trishnaguha I got rid of the the retry_json. 
However, the dict type is not just for json. This is valid on n7k when the banner type is exec. 
So we need this block.
All tests pass
